"The Wheel of Time" has several companion books that are considered part of the series.
They include "The World of Robert Jordan's The Wheel of Time," "The Wheel of Time Companion," and "The Wheel of Time Roleplaying Game." These books provide additional information about the world and characters.
Some fans also consider the prequel, "New Spring," to be a companion book to the series.
